Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometries.Geometry
      • geometries.Polygon
        • geometries.Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    geometries.Intersectable

    public class Triangle
extends geometries.Polygon
    class Triangle that represents a Polygon with 3 points the father is Polygon
    Author:
    Batya Tamsot and Nehora Levy
